headline.main: DE GAULLE ASKS SPEED; Wants Immediate Meeting With Giraud in Algiers

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 2 -- Firmly bent on personal discussions with General Giraud, General de Gaulle cabled to him today suggesting an immediate meeting in Algiers looking toward the ironing out of the differences blocking complete unity between their movements.
abstract: pro-de Gaulle demonstrations reptd, Algiers; de Gaulle cables Giraud for immediate Algiers meeting; pol situation discussed; Giraud pol prisons abolition seen aiding unity
snippet: LONDON, May 2 -- Firmly bent on personal discussions with General Giraud, General de Gaulle cabled to him today suggesting an immediate meeting in Algiers looking toward the ironing out of the differences blocking complete unity between their move...
